description: Try our easy to follow Rainbow Minestrone Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Minestrone,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Healthier Easier,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Low fat
name: Rainbow Minestrone Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Sprinkle cheese over the sourdough and bake on prepared tray for 13 minutes or until cheese is golden.
Heat oil in a large pot and sauté potato and garlic for 2 minutes.
Add cabbage and veggie mix and cook for 3 minutes, or until vegetables are slightly softened.
Add stock, 2 cups water and kidney beans, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 5 minutes. Serve soup in bowls with cheesy sourdough on the side.
